de.hartz.vpn.main.installation

Class InstallationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hartz.vpn.main.installation.InstallationController

  • public class InstallationController
extends java.lang.Object
    The installation controller that can show a given order of panels.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  InstallationController.InstallationCallback
      Interface to notify the caller after installation.

      • setMainFrameVisible

        public void setMainFrameVisible(boolean visible)
        Sets the installation frames visibility. Not possible if it was started without GUI.
        Parameters:
        visible - Boolean indicating whether the frame should be visible.

      • addClientPanel

        public void addClientPanel()
        Adds a specific panel to the client panel order. After the config file has loaded, so it can decide which adapter to install.

      • forceNextPanel

        public void forceNextPanel(InstallationPanel currentPanel)
        Can be called to force going to the next panel. Can produce errors. Should only be called if there is work to be done before going to the next panel.

      • getTmpConfigState

        public ConfigState getTmpConfigState()
        Returns the temporarily ConfigState of the network. After successfull installation it will be moved to UserData
